message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $95. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
I'm still thinking it's a bit pricey, but I'm willing to meet you at $92. That's the most I'm willing to pay for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $94. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $91. Can you meet me there?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $93. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you, and I'm willing to meet you as close as possible.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me one more time, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $90. Can you meet me there?
